channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree is dying. It's grown too large and it's drooping over. It's so large that it's rotting the fences and we're concerned that it will just topple if it rots any further., 10th December
item.description:
To the rear of numbers 210 and 208. Access via south bank

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, South Bank, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
